headline: INFICON RESIDUAL GAS ANALYZER
categories.lvl1: Vacuum Processing Equipment > Vacuum Process Instrumentation
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Process Instrumentation > Residual Gas Analyzers
specstable:
Manufacturer Inficon
Model TRANSPECTOR CIS2
Description Residual Gas Analyzer
Mass Range 300 AMU
Other Information
  • Mass Range: 1 to 300 amu
  • Detector Type high-performance combination electron multiplier/Faraday cup (EM/FC)
  • Resolution: 1 amu wide @ 10% peak height over entire mass range
  • Base Pressure Performance: 5 x 10-9 Torr ( 6.6 x 10-9 mbar)
  • Ambient Temperature 20 to 50 Deg C
  • Relative Humidity: 80%
    CVD/Etch Ion Source:
  • Ion Source Conductance: 0.7 l/s (7 x 10-4 m3/s)
  • Process Pressure Range:
    Orifice Size (Optimum Pressure)
    (defined by orifice diameter in inlet system)
    0.01, 0.1, 1, 10, 100 Torr
  • Minimum Detectable Composition Change:0.2 ppm
  • TWare32 software p/n 911-339-G3, will work with Windows XP
    As of 2015 Inficon is not supporting Tware32 and giving software for free


Foreline pump not included

Condition New-Never Used
CE Marked YES
Weight 75 lb (34 kg)
